attributes.action: "ring fence" Company pension funds against seizure in the event that the Company goes bankrupt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to insure that the employees are not disenfranchised of their private pension when a Company goes into liquidation.
Such a scheme could be limited to exclude a agreed period i.e; 3 years leading up to the liquidation to prevent the Company Directors from feather nesting their retirements etc at the expense of the creditors & shareholders.
The Companies Act should require a Company to submit evidence as to the reasons why it's yearly contributions to it's pension scheme is justified in line with it's yearly performance.
